main event: A round or disc-shaped object, luminous or reflecting light, was observed near Gonzales, Texas in October 1951. The object made a sharp turn and accelerated rapidly.
interesting points: The object was observed by a reliable and experienced witness, Mrs. J.B. Gonzalez.
The object exhibited characteristics of a 'flying disc' and did not conform to any known aircraft or natural phenomena.
The object was estimated to be about 2 yards in diameter, with a white or creamy center and a darker grayish white outer ring.
The object hovered briefly and then disappeared rapidly, with no sound or trail.
sighted object: a round or disc-shaped object, luminous or reflecting light
